parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the object around where the unit finds cover. The minDist, visibilityPosition and ignoreObject parameters are optional.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Not implemented in Arma 2 or Arma 3, always returns [[objNull]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''findCover''' [position, hidePosition, maxDist, minDist, visibilityPosition, ignoreObject]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [position, hidePosition, maxDist, minDist, visibilityPosition, ignoreObject]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position]] </value></part><part><name/>=<value>Paramater 3
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> hidePosition: [[Array]] - format [[getHideFrom]]. Position of that which the unit should hide from
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> maxDist: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> minDist: [[Number]] (Optional)
</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> visibilityPosition: [[Array]] - format [[Position]] (Optional) used to select cover that unit can see in that direction from
</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> ignoreObject: [[Object]] (Optional) Ignore this object in visibility check
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - always [[objNull]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> -
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getHideFrom]], [[setHideBehind]], [[isHidden]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 4, 2015 - 22:01 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:SnowSky|SnowSky]]</dt>
<dd class="note">An alternative function in Arma 3 might be [[BIS_fnc_findSafePos]]

<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment></dl>
